meanings.definition: Hektares: a metric unit of area equal to 10,000 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The farm measured five hektares in total.
meanings.sent2: The park spans several hektares of land.
meanings.sent3: I dream of owning a hektares-sized garden one day.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was as vast as a hektares.
meanings.sent5: The hektares of forest were teeming with wildlife.
